                      Eq b (instHAdd.hAdd a (instHMul.hMul (instHDiv.hDiv (instHSub.hSub b a) N.cast) N.cast)) →
                        Real.instPreorder.le (Chapter11.upper_integral f (Chapter11.BoundedInterval.Icc a b))
                            ((Finset.range N).sum fun j =>
                              instHMul.hMul
                                (f
                                  (instHAdd.hAdd a
                                    (instHMul.hMul (instHDiv.hDiv (instHSub.hSub b a) N.cast)
                                      (instHAdd.hAdd j.cast 1))))
                                (instHDiv.hDiv (instHSub.hSub b a) N.cast)) →
                          ∀ (j : Nat),
                            Finset.instMembership.mem (Finset.range N) j →
                              ∀ (x : Real),
                                Real.instPreorder.le
                                    (instHAdd.hAdd a (instHMul.hMul (instHDiv.hDiv (instHSub.hSub b a) N.cast) j.cast))
                                    x →
                                  Real.instPreorder.lt x
                                      (instHAdd.hAdd a
                                        (instHMul.hMul (instHDiv.hDiv (instHSub.hSub b a) N.cast)
                                          (instHAdd.hAdd j.cast 1))) →
                                    instLENat.le (instHAdd.hAdd j 1) N
